data.author: Pollus Fornerod
data.description:
Inspired by the 1975 "Berlin-Uhr" by Dieter Binninger, this watchface has a different way of telling the time. 
Each segment in the top row represents five hours, the segments in the second row count the hours. The third row displays five minutes per segment and the last row shows single minutes. 
Add them together and it gives you the current time. Allow a week to get used to this elaborate system.
Let your inner nerd fly!
data.title: Berlin Clock

data.author: Will Sloan
data.description: Watchface for Molly's Christmas Present.

data.description:
26 mar: ability to turn off weather desc.


Many thanks to those who helped with testing!

----------------------
Set your own style. A very simple watchface design with bigger numbers, a configurable background, a custom text description for weather, optional time pattern, and more.  All configurable via the settings page.

please contact me if you find any bugs or notice something strange.

data.description: A recreation of the classic Windows screensaver that simulates flying through space. As your battery decreases, fewer stars will appear on screen. This is different than the other "starfield" faces where the stars only move horizontally. The stars are offset from the time for readability.

data.author: mlpn-unlimited

changelog.release_notes: 1.2 Added Day of the week and change to layout.

Wishing you a HaPpY New Year 2015 to all you folks out there.

Most of the times I look at my pebble watch and appreciate how the beautiful it is. I really am not looking for checking time always. If you are like me this watch face will show a Happy New Year screen that is perfect for the screen. To check date and time, just shake your wrist.

data.description:
Folks, Most of the times I look at my pebble watch and appreciate how beautiful it is. I really am not checking time always. If you are like me, this watch face will show a celebrations message perfect for the screen. To check date and time, just shake your wrist.

Please give me a heart if you love this watch face.
Wishing a HaPpY St Patrick's Day to all you folks out there.
data.title: Happy Saint Patrick's Day

data.author: Chris Goldsmith
data.description:
For times before half past the hour the time is shown normally in black on a white background. For times after that and before the next hour the time is shown as a countdown to the next hour.

So the time is shown as: -
black on white - 15:01, 15:02, ..., 15:29, 15:30
white on black - 29:16, 28:16, ... 01:16, 16:00, 16:01
data.title: Swapsies

data.author: Game Time

changelog.release_notes:
-Updated for Pebble 2

-Updated configuration page
--Added Weather Underground provider

-Updated time font

-Removed Exclamation point
Weather now requires an API Key to retrieve weather. You can retrieve an API Key from Openweathermap.org.
-Update adds weather based on city, if left blank will use GPS for weather.

- Improved battery display (every 2 bars is 25%)
- Time display changed
- Loading has been changed to Sneaking
- Fahrenheit version
-Fixed bug that crashed watch face when connected to charger

-Codec signal simulates watch battery life
-Minor bug fix to date and time not appearing right away
-Updated menu icon
Date is now included in the codec frequency. (Month and Day)
-Includes 6 additional character portraits from Metal Gear Ghost Babel.

-Fixed issue with bluetooth image being off center
-Updated Metal Gear Solid title to Metal Gear Pebble

-Portraits randomly change each hour
-Bluetooth disconnection/connection notification
-5 new characters added including Campbell, Mcbride, Weasel, Chris, and Deepthroat

data.description:
Based off the Gameboy classic Metal Gear: Ghost Babel

Features Include:

-Bluetooth connection notification.
-Random character portraits each hour.
-Battery life simulated by the codec signal.
-Weather by GPS or by City. Weather requires a free API key from Openweathermap.org or Wunderground.com
-Temperature scale selection.

latest_release.release_notes:
-Updated for Pebble 2

-Updated configuration page
--Added Weather Underground provider

-Updated time font

-Removed Exclamation point

Iron Man inspired watchface. 

Programmed from scratch based on prior work by vvdofabio (http://www.mypebblefaces.com/index.php?cID=2226) and slayer1551 (http://www.mypebblefaces.com/concepts/1/100/)

Features:
- 12h/24h time in seconds
- Date, weekday, year
- Weather condition
- Temperature
- Battery level (turns into Arc Reactor when charging)
- Bluetooth lost connection warning

data.description:
Pokétch Digital is a Pebble watchface designed to emulate the digital watchface used on the Pokétch watch in Pokémon Diamond/Pearl/Platinum.

Currently at V1.0, it displays similarly to the Poketch digital watchface in Pokémon Platinum. With the Pikachu image at the bottom.

Planned Features:

Config Settings: Toggle Pikachu, Flashing Separaters, Colour Inversion, Vibrate on Hour.

Possible Features:

Setting that makes Pikachu release static from his cheeks while causing the Pebble to vibrate (sort of similar to Pokémon Pinball).

data.description:
Simplicity, but with shake-to-activate backlight (won't auto turn-off) from 7pm to 7am. Great for those who want to use Pebble as a nightlight, or can't read notifications quickly enough for the short backlight (shake to activate permanent backlight works regardless of notification popup). Small plus sign on right side distinguishes it from stock Simplicity. Welcome to feedback/suggestions.

v1.0 - Initial Release
v1.1 - Now has shake-to-activate 15 second backlight from 7am to 7pm

changelog.release_notes:
Update to optimize code and battery use.
Added second pulse to autobot logo.  Should be low power.

Initial version for release!

All features working.  Will work on further customization later.

data.description:
Bold display using the autobot symbol to show both battery and bluetooth connection.  Shows time, day of month, and day of week.

This watchface expects you to have a bluetooth device connected to the watch.  When the watch loses connection, it buzzes up to three times (one per minute) warning you that you have left bluetooth range of the connected device.  This is to prevent you from losing your phone.

If you do not have a bluetooth device, just ignore the buzzing until the 3rd warning, and it will go away.

Currently in testing to make sure that battery use is minimized.  Updates possible.

latest_release.release_notes:
Update to optimize code and battery use.
Added second pulse to autobot logo.  Should be low power.

data.title: Autobot Bold

data.author: Staffan Thomen

changelog.release_notes: Long neglected, this watchface is now up to date and should work on all pebble versions, except chalk.
1.8 Reworked the watchface states, it should now hopefully be less messed up
Fixes a glitch introduced in 1.6 (shadows across the top line of the time segments)
Build with SDK 3.0 to support Pebble Time
1.5: Implement toggling display of the info and date rows
1.3: Adds fixes for language display, blink charge level when charging and option to vibrate on bluetooth events
1.2: Fix problem where disabling the blink would stop time (on the watchface)
1.1, '-' was missing from the character set, so the bluetooth icon would be blank instead of a '-', breaking the illusion of a segmented display.

data.description: Shows the time in 7-segment retro style. Day (using the new pebble localized strings), date, battery level and bluetooth status in 14-segment text. Optionally remove the "shadows" of dark segments, stop the blinking of the dots and charge pecent when charging and vibrate on bluetooth events.

latest_release.release_notes: Long neglected, this watchface is now up to date and should work on all pebble versions, except chalk.

data.title: 7 Seg

data.author: TTV69
data.description:
Get in the Christmas spirit. A simple watchface with an animated snow shower. Hours of mesmerizing fun watching the flakes fall, one by one, building a wondrous winter scene. The snow is random so no two snowfalls are the same (display resets when snow reaches the top). We even got some pseudo pebble physics going on here!

Shake your pebble for...

Number of sleeps until Christmas day (this is very important),
Date,
Battery status,
Bluetooth connection status

There's also a sneaky easter egg in there ;-)

Enjoy and Merry Christmas!
data.title: Snow Time

This variant of Text Watch with Date displays the day and date in the bottom right hand corner. The date is shown in the UK-style day-month-year format.

data.description:
From http://www.quora.com/What-are-all-the-Jeff-Dean-facts :

"Jeff Dean's watch displays seconds since January 1st, 1970. He is never late.

In short, it just shows unix time or time since the Jan 1, 1970 epoch."

Two or three characters wrap to a second line for easy reading. This is probably a feature, not a bug.

data.description:
Time in bubbles that respond to movement of your wrist. It originally had another name but everyone who saw it said it looked like a Lava Lamp.

Like anything that animates the screen this will use battery much faster than a conventional watch-face however we have added some optimisations to reduce the battery usage. If your arm is still then battery usage is minimised. Developed as a proof of concept

data.description:
Does it matter if it's three minutes past five, or that it's about five past?

This watchface does that: it shows the time to the nearest five minutes, no more no less.

It also looks pretty good while doing it.

Should you need to, you can shake your watch to see the exact time.

If you want the text left-aligned, you can use this version: https://apps.getpebble.com/applications/5672cea4fa6d41434000000f

latest_release.release_notes: Fixing "o'clock o'clock" error (hopefully).  Thanks to David Davidson for noticing and letting me know.

data.description:
Do you play Ingress? Are you a member of the Resistance? You should be.

This simple watchface was developed to showcase the Fredericksburg Resistance, a group of dedicated agents centered in historic Fredericksburg, Virginia.  This watchface highlights the spirit of the resistance, by  showcasing the Fredsistance logo along with an easy to read time and date in the official Ingress Coda font.

- Date and time display using the official Ingress Coda font.

data.author: Ben Nguyen

changelog.release_notes:
adding "oh" to single digit minute in "machine style":
2:03 = two oh three

- add current weather condition:
  + refreshes every 15 minutes
  + if failed, display only time
- add bluetooth connection alert: invert display & short vibrate

data.description:
★New Name New Feature★Tell times in plain English in many ways★
Like it? Heart it!

features:
- tells time in plain English multiple ways:
  + fuzzy (ex. 12:44 = quarter to one)
  + human (ex. 12:44 = sixteen to one)
  + machine (ex. 12:44 = twelve forty four)
- (optional) alignment
- shake to show detailed time, date, battery & (optional) current weather condition (with temperature in C or F)
- midday & midnight time
- monitor bluetooth connectivity with phone (vibrates & invert)
data.title: Ultimate Text Watch

data.author: Anthony Avina

changelog.release_notes: binarypebl now supports both 24 hour and 12 hour format. The format shown depends on the user's Time Display setting on their Pebble.

data.description: A simple, binary watchface for Pebble. Displays hours and minutes in columns of bits in the format: "HH:MM" Supports both 24-hour and 12-hour format based on user's Time Display configuration within Date & Time. Need help reading the watchface? Visit the linked Wikipedia web page!

latest_release.release_notes: binarypebl now supports both 24 hour and 12 hour format. The format shown depends on the user's Time Display setting on their Pebble.

data.author: Denis Huber

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed an translation issue
Added French and Spanish support
V1.1: Fixed "Full" label at the end of charge

data.description:
Functionality:

- De/En/Fr/Es language
- Time, Date, Calenderweek
- "Pebble" when connected to the phone
- Vibrates when the connection to the phone gets lost / comes back
- "Char..." when charging
- "Full" when charged 100%
- "Empty" under 20%
- The line under the date indicates the battery level

The fr and es translations aren't complete. Please give me native input to complete it. Thx.

If you like the watch face please donate:
pebble.donate@albmail.de

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed an translation issue
Added French and Spanish support

data.title: SimpleClock

data.author: metakirby5

changelog.release_notes: Fix bluetooth icon clipping and icon

Code refactor
Add date
Add bluetooth
Add battery

Initial Kirby changed to random, updated from "mix"
Change interval changed to 1 minute, up from 5 seconds

data.description:
When Kirby swallows two enemies with abilities at once, he gets the "mix" ability, which allows him to select an ability from a very fast roulette. This is meant to pay homage to that :)

FEATURES:
- Copy ability changes every minute!
- Inverts based on day/night! (6am-6pm / 6pm-6am)
- Date, bluetooth status, and battery status!
data.title: Kirby Day/Night

data.author: Justin Carvalho
data.description:
A tweak on the text watch, that includes the weather in the top right, date in the bottom left, and battery percent in the bottom left.

Notes:
-Inverted version
-Weather and battery update once an hour.
-Weather requires GPS services on your phone to be turned on.
-Weather is displayed in CURRENT (LOW/HIGH) CONDITIONS format in Celsius.
data.title: Inverted Text Watch Weather Date Battery

data.author: xstefanx

changelog.release_notes:
The date and temperature font sizes have been scaled back to fit the screen better. 

The loading text for the weather was dropping onto a second line. This has been replaced with "...".

After looking over other watchfaces, and options for the broken clouds condition icon, I'll be omitting it and leaving the cloudy partially cloudy icon in it's place.
I've temporarily assigned the broken clouds description to the cloudy icon. I noticed that there was not an image tied to this condition and needed a quick fix until I can obtain an icon for it.
This is the initial release of Simple Weather F/C, which is a Pebble Watchface that displays the temperature in both fahrenheit and celsius.

data.description: Watchface that shows the temperature in both Fahrenheit and Celsius.

latest_release.release_notes:
The date and temperature font sizes have been scaled back to fit the screen better. 

The loading text for the weather was dropping onto a second line. This has been replaced with "...".

After looking over other watchfaces, and options for the broken clouds condition icon, I'll be omitting it and leaving the cloudy partially cloudy icon in it's place.

data.title: Simple Weather F/C

data.author: jpalazz2

changelog.release_notes: Finally updated! I rewrote all the animations from the ground up so it basically never crashes anymore. Ability to disable the bluetooth error icon in the configuration settings. Pebble time support! Toothless now has eye color and the battery indicator turns red when your battery is <= 20%!
Updated to include a configuration menu. You can now disable the battery indicator from the configuration menu, and may also set the date format.

data.description: An animated version of Toothless the dragon! Every minute Toothless blinks his eyes and looks around. Features battery level and Bluetooth status indicator.

latest_release.release_notes: Finally updated! I rewrote all the animations from the ground up so it basically never crashes anymore. Ability to disable the bluetooth error icon in the configuration settings. Pebble time support! Toothless now has eye color and the battery indicator turns red when your battery is <= 20%!

data.title: Toothless Animated

data.author: JGib
data.description:
Tactile inspired watch face.  Upper group of 4 white dots indicate the hour and lower group of 4 white dots indicate the minutes (in 5 minute increments). White dot on the right indicates PM.
Example:
All dark = 0000
All white = 2355
Upper left white = 0100
Upper right white = 0200
Upper row and third row white and PM indicator = 1725
Upper left and right dot on second row white = 0900
https://github.com/JustSid/Tactile
data.title: Tactile

Animated tree lights!

Configure: 
- Display style
- Weather with/without location enabled
- °C or °F
On the hour weather updates:
- Current temperature 
- High/low of day

Merry Christmas everyone!

data.author: Marty Kausas
data.description:
WaveWatcher is a watchface that displays surf information to the user. With a completely beach themed look, WaveWatcher is a clean watchface for those who want to quickly check surf, water temperature, air temperature, and visibility on the coastline.

The graph on the left displays the rise and fall of swell height for the current and next 7 hours.

Powered by World Weather Online
data.title: WaveWatcher

data.title: YouWatch

data.author: TomHol
data.description:
Look at time as a resource
1. set your preferred time of the end of your productive day
2. see the remaining hours and minutes for today. The green background changes to yellow, if less than three hours are remaining, and to red, if it is less than one hour.

For example: you know you're able to work till 22:00 (10 PM). You set 22:00 in the configuration. At 8:30 in the morning you will see 13:30 remaining.

It works with working over the midnight. So at 10PM you will have 4 hours till 2 AM.
data.title: Useful time remaining
